: : Sting/Hollywood : :

Hollywood thinks about his Autobot past.

Hollywoo=
d:  Damn Maximals got what they deserved, brother!

Sting:   They were shat=
tered mercilessly by our awesome power.

Sting looks at the logo.

Sting:  =
Indeed, our enemies shall be crushed beneath our iron fist, and die knowing=
 that their fate was decided by the New World Order!...

------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------------
The pr=
eceding announcement has been paid for by the 
New World Order


  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:41 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : =
: Razor / Diesel ::

  Diesel: The Maximals tried to defend it, but the han=
ger and the Maximals themselves were left in ruin.

  Razor had a wicked sm=
ile at this.

  Razor: Ha ha. Stupid Maximals. You guys our great. Anyway a=
 little bit of buisness. 

  Razor brings up the nWo logo on the computer s=
creen.

  Razor: We should all have this logo on us. I want our enemies who=
 know who destroys them!

  ***********************************************=
********************
  The preceding announcement has been paid for by the
=
  New World Order

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss =

    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:34 PM
=
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    : : Sting/Hollywood : :

    Hollywo=
od grins.

    Hollywood:  It's good to have you all here, brothers!

    H=
e nods at Razor.

    Hollywood:  We could use those parts.  Say, brother, =
that looks like a pretty high-tech ship.

    Sting:  Yeah, we pirated it f=
rom some Maximals.  At least, I think they owned it.

    -----------------=
---------------------------------------------------------------------
    T=
he preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
    New World Order
